abstract.t: This document defines a YANG model for Smart Filters for push updates. Smart Filters allow to filter push updates based on values of pushed datastore nodes and/or state, such as previous updates. Smart Filters provide an important building block for service assurance and network automation. This revision of the document is intended as a placeholder, containing the problem statement of draft-clemm-netconf-push-smart- filters-ps-00 that has recently expired. The YANG model itself still needs to be defined.
